function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of AI tools for monitoring social distancing compliance","Impact":"Potential privacy concerns and data security risks","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy policies and secure data encryption methods","Technologies":"Data encryption, anonymization techniques","People":"General public, individuals being monitored","Owner":"AI companies, government agencies"},{"Description":"Utilization of cough sound analysis tool for identifying potential patients","Impact":"Potential misdiagnosis and misidentification of individuals based on cough sounds","Mitigation":"Cross-verify with traditional diagnostic methods and medical examination","Technologies":"Traditional diagnostic tools, medical examination equipment","People":"Patients being identified, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, medical facilities"},{"Description":"Deployment of COVID-19 bus equipped with AI tools for screening based on X-ray analysis","Impact":"Potential misinterpretation of X-ray results leading to misdiagnosis","Mitigation":"Review by trained medical professionals before making diagnosis","Technologies":"Trained medical professionals, X-ray interpretation guidelines","People":"Individuals being screened, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Municipal Corporation, medical facilities"}]}
